Entries.Introduction: Ah, Mayor Lewis told me you just arrived. I'm Marnie!#$e#I sell livestock and animal care products at my ranch. Swing by any time. I *might* be home!$h
Entries.spring_1_2: A new year means new opportunities! Here's hoping for a good one.$1
Entries.spring_12: *Yawn* Sorry, I'm a bit tired today. Jas and I were up late last night painting eggs for the big egg Hunt tomorrow#$e#It's wonderful to see her so excited!$l
Entries.spring_12_2: *Yawn* Sorry, I'm a bit tired today. Jas and I were up late last night painting eggs for the big egg Hunt tomorrow#$e#It's wonderful to see her so excited!$l
Entries.Mon: I love animals, Mr. @. If you treat yours well I'm sure we'll become good friends!^I just love animals, Ms. @. Treat them kindly and we'll become friends, I'm sure!
Entries.Tue: It's good to see %farm finally getting the attention it deserves. It was heart-breaking watching the place fall to ruin.
Entries.Wed: #$1 SiloTip#You should build a silo before you clear out all that grass.#$e#the winters here can be pretty rough, and your animals won't want to leave their barn.#$b#Or you can just buy all your hay from me. I certainly won't complain!$u|You can use a scythe to cut the grass into hay#$e#But I'm sure you've figured that out already!
Entries.Thu: There's something magical about the valley in spring.$3#$e#It's like the world has come back to life.$1
Entries.Fri: Are you interested in livestock? Chickens are a good place to start.$1#$e#They're social birds, so you'll need at least two.$1#$b#And I'm not just saying that because you're buying them from me!$1
Entries.Sat: It's hard not to get attached to farm animals. They all have such unique personalities.$1
Entries.Sun: Well, this week has been a grand mix of ups and downs. How's it been with you, @?
Entries.Mon2: My nephew Shane has been staying at my place the last few months.#$e#He helps me out with the chickens, so I'm not complaining.  It's nice to have some company, but he keeps to himself a lot.
Entries.Tue2: Animals are great company, but they're not good at conversation. I enjoy my Tuesday catch-up with the girls.$1#e#Did you need something from my shop? You did? Sorry, I'll be back behind the desk tomorrow!$2
Entries.Wed2: Have you met Jasmine? She's been living with me, since... well, it's not my place to say.$2#$e#Err, um, how are things with you?$1
Entries.Thu2: Hi @!#$e#I'll be getting some new animals in soon.#$e#They've been rescued from bad homes, so they'll need extra TLC.#$e#Just keep treating your animals with respect and good things will happen.
Entries.Fri2: After a hard day's work, it's always nice to catch up with people in the saloon.$1#$e#Friday nights are my favourite. It just feels more vibrant... more alive.$1
Entries.Sat2: I worry about Shane. I feel like I barely ever see him anymore.$2#$e#Please keep an eye on him for me, will you? I know he can be a bit abrupt, but he's got a good heart.
Entries.Sun2: I found a weird black egg in the coop this morning. Jas wants to put it in the incubator.#$q 671/672 Void_Egg#What do you think?#$r 671 20 Void_EggHatch#That sounds like a great idea!#$r 672 -10 VoidEggNo#No way! It looks evil. Best throw it away.
Entries.Void_EggNo: No animal is evil. But you're probably right.$2
Entries.Void_Egg: $p 671#That weird black egg we put in the incubator? Well, guess what? It hatched! The chick's a bit odd, but she seems to fit in well.$4|I know you advised against it... but Jas insisted. The chick's a bit odd, but she seems to fit in okay.$4.
Entries.Mon4: It's weird, but sometimes, even though I'm surrounded by animals and with Shane and Jas around...I still feel a little lonely.
Entries.Tue4: I hope everything is going well on your farm, @.#$e#It's a lot of responsibility, for one so young - although I suppose I wasn't much older than you when I took over the ranch.
Entries.Wed4: Jas really loves the animals. She gives them all names, you know.#$e#She's very fond of Vincent, but I wish there were more children here for her to play with.
Entries.Thu4: #$1 marnieTerribleGoose#We took on a rescue goose. Now, I love animals, and they do deserve our respect - but that bird's a menace!$k$5#$e#Hey there, it's good to see you, @!
Entries.Fri4: Are you dropping by the Saloon tonight? It's a great way to catch up with everyone!
Entries.Sat4: Our crazy goose escaped yesterday! It chased Lewis halfway across town!$5#$e#I feel a bit guilty laughing about it! But it was pretty hilarious.
Entries.Mon6: I gave Shane his first beer. Sometimes I worry that his behaviour is all my fault...$2#$e#Then again, with everything else, who knows? The poor lad has had some pretty heavy burdens.
Entries.Tue6: I inherited this ranch from my grandparents too. I grew up in Zuzu, believe it or not!$1#$e#But when I visited them here in the holidays, it really felt like home.
Entries.Wed6: A stoat got into our henhouse last night.$5#$e#Thank Yoba for our big black hen, Ebony, if it wasn't for her... well, I dread to think!$2
Entries.Thu6: Jas and I watched one of her animated films, now the song is stuck in my head.$2#$e#It sure is great to see her smiling though!$1
Entries.Fri6: Friday already? Well, I know where I'm going tonight...You've probably noticed, @, my heart yearns for a certain someone.$1
Entries.Sat6: Relationships are complicated, aren't they, @?$4#$e#Do you believe in soulmates? I thought I'd found mine... but now I'm not so sure.$2
Entries.Sun6: Sometimes, when I look at Jasmine, I see her mother staring back.$3#$e#They're so much alike, and I miss her so very much.$2
Entries.Mon8: Spring is the time for lovers, and romance, and it hurts, having to hide how I feel about Lewis.$4#$e#Sometimes I wonder if it's all just a game to him, and he doesn't really love me at all.$2
Entries.Tue8: Growing up, I never really had much in the way of family.$3#$e#But now, with Shane and Jas, I've made my own!$1
Entries.Wed8: A new cow came in yesterday. Jas has named her 'Buttercup'. Poor thing's all skin and bones.$2#$e#How can anyone possibly hurt an animal like that? It really breaks my heart.$2
Entries.Thu8: Jas let me read a story she wrote in school today. That lass has quite the imagination!$2#$e#I'm not sure whether to be impressed or scared!$3
Entries.Sat8: Sorry if I'm a little grouchy today. Jas woke us up again last night. Nightmares, you know.#$e#I'm sure she was too young to remember it, but I'm worried her mom's death still haunts her.$2
Entries.Sun8: She might be his god-daughter, but Shane's the only father Jas has ever known.#$e#She really looks up to him.$3
Entries.spring_23: Jas is so excited about the flower dance tomorrow. I wish Shane showed the same level of enthusiasm.$2
Entries.spring_23_2: Jas is so excited about the flower dance tomorrow. I wish Shane showed the same level of enthusiasm.$2
Entries.spring_25: Did you enjoy the Flower Dance yesterday? I do wish I had someone to dance with me. But...#$q 967/968 MarnFlower_followup#...I guess it's just for you young folk, isn't it?#$r 967 15 MarnFlower_marl#Of course not! I'm fairly certain Marlon has his eye on you!#$r 967 30 MarnFlower_lew#You should've asked the Mayor!#$r 968 -10 MarnFlower_yes#Sorry, but yes.
Entries.MarnFlower_lew: Oh! I'm sure I'm not important enough to dance with the Mayor!$1
Entries.MarnFlower_yes: Oh. I guess you're right. I'm sure I'd look ridiculous. $2
Entries.MarnFlower_followup: $p 967#We'll just have to see what happens next year!$1|I'll never have the courage to ask.$4
Entries.spring_28: Sorry if I'm a little down today. It's the anniversary of the day I lost someone close to me.$2
Entries.spring_Fri8: Sometimes I wonder if I'm Lewis's secret lover...or his dirty secret...$4#$q 969/970 MarnLewi_followup#I trust your judgment, @. Would it really matter if people knew about our relationship?#$r 969 10 MarnLewi_no#No! The man's a fool!#$r 969 0 MarnLewi_neu#Marnie, I think you might find everyone knows already.#$r 970 -25 MarnLewi_yes#Yes, it would undermine his authority as Mayor.
Entries.MarnLewi_no: Thanks, @. It's good to know you're on my side.
Entries.MarnLewi_neu: Really?!$4#$e#But you're probably right. This town is pretty small!$1
Entries.MarnLewi_followup: $p 969#It's time he and I had a serious discussion about our future.$2|I guess it's best I respect his discretion, at least for now.
Entries.summer_2_1: Running a rescue ranch isn't easy, there's a lot of expenses. Thank Yoba, Lewis arranged for a Ferngill Community Grant.#$e#I don't know how I'd ever repay him, but I've invited him over for dinner tonight.
Entries.summer_4: It's Jas's birthday today, so I baked our favourite: pink cake.#$e#Would you like to try a piece?[221]#$e#What's in it, you ask? Well, that's our little secret!$1
Entries.summer_4_2: It's Jas's birthday today, so I baked our favourite: pink cake.#$e#Would you like to try a piece?[221]#$e#What's in it, you ask? Well, that's our little secret!$1
Entries.summer_28: I hope you'll come watch the moonlight jellies tonight. They really are quite magical.
Entries.summer_28_2: Jas is really excited about the moonlight jellies tonight. They really are quite magical.
Entries.summer_Mon: Have you been to that strange tower west of my house?#$e#One time I heard this terrible, otherworldly noise coming from there.$s#$e#I would avoid that place if I were you...
Entries.summer_Tue4: #$1 VoidEggGift#I found this strange egg in my coop this morning. I've no idea how it got there. I thought you might know what to do with it! [305]#$k#There was something snuffling around last night, and the animals seem unsettled today.#$b#I hope it's not a fox. Or worse.
Entries.summer_Wed: The days are getting warmer, make sure you've got lots of fresh water around!#$e#Just like your plants, animals get thirsty in this heat. And don't forget %pet!
Entries.summer_Thu: Pigs are pretty smart, you know? And they really will eat anything.$1#$e#Treat them with kindness, and they'll dig up plenty of truffles for you!
Entries.summer_Fri: Take care not to shut any animals outside at night.#$e#Creatures hunt these woods after dark.
Entries.summer_Sun: You know, if you need wool for any projects, rabbits are much easier to look after than sheep.#$e#Not as reliable, perhaps, but you don't have to shear them every day!
Entries.summer_10: Oh, there's so much to do today! Mayor Lewis has me organizing the potluck at the Luau#$e#I'm sure you've got some fine produce to add!
Entries.summer_10_2: Oh, there's so much to do for the Luau tomorrow!#$e#I'm sure you've got some fine produce to add!
Entries.summer_12: Oh dear, I don't know about you, @, but I ate far too much at the Luau!
Entries.summer_12_2: Oh dear, I don't know about you, @, but I ate far too much at the Luau!
Entries.summer_Mon2: Sometimes it's nice to leave the ranch and stretch my legs.#$e#The forest can be pleasant this time of year - all sorts of critters out and about!
Entries.summer_Tue2: It's nice to have some adult company, butw Jodi and Caroline can be such gossips!#$e#In a small town like this, I guess secrets are hard to hide, @.$3
Entries.summer_Wed2: It's sappy I know, but I've never had the heart to farm animals for their meat.
Entries.summer_Thu2: Sam's taking the kids to the beach today.$2#$e#He's a good lad, and Jas loves collecting shells, but I wish Shane would spend more time with her.
Entries.summer_Fri2: I'm excited about tonight. Why? You ask.$2#$e#Oh, no reason! *giggles*$3
Entries.summer_Sat2: Jas says something was rustling in the bushes last night. I hope it's not that fox.
Entries.summer_Mon4: Pierre's fresh produce arrives on Mondays, and I like dabbling in the kitchen. Here, taste this.#$e#Needs a touch more salt, do you think?$3
Entries.summer_Tue: How is %pet coping with the heat? I feel so much happier knowing that the wee fellow found a good home!
Entries.summer_Wed4: Shane helps out with the chickens, so I'm not complaining, but I wish he'd spend more time at home.$2#$e#Jas misses having him around.
Entries.summer_Fri4: Jas might love all animals, but even she's wary of our crazy goose!$2#$e#I'd find him a new home, but I doubt anyone would take him.
Entries.summer_Sat4: Have you ever been in love, @?#$e#Sorry! I didn't mean to get too personal.#$e#I've just been thinking about it - love - a lot recently.
Entries.summer_Sun4: I do wonder what Shane does in the kitchen all day. He tried to cook pepper poppers once.#$e#Let's just say, it wasn't a success.$4
Entries.summer_Mon6: Jas keeps talking about 'happy apples' that live in Cindersap forest.#$e#She has such a delightful imagination.
Entries.summer_Tue6: Have you been into the mines? Jas's mother loved to explore them.#$e#Thank Yoba, Jas didn't inherit her reckless spirit!
Entries.summer_Thu6: %farm is really looking beautiful, @. You're certainly doing your grandfather proud!
Entries.summer_Fri6: These lovely warm nights are perfect for a midnight picnic!#$e#Oh... there just might be a special someone.$1
Entries.summer_Sat6: It's such a lovely day today, it would be nice to visit the beach with a special someone.$1#$e#I understand he's very busy, but I wish Lewis had more time with me.$2
Entries.summer_Sun6: Animals are such peaceful company. They don't judge you for your flaws.#$e#Unless you forget to feed them, of course!$1
Entries.summer_Mon8: When I was younger, I always dreamed of having my own children some day.#$e#But I suppose I've made a family of sorts, haven't I?
Entries.summer_Tue8: Do you sometimes wonder if it's worth taking a big risk that might ruin everything?#$e#Or is it safer to stick with the status quo?
Entries.summer_Wed8: %pet came to visit me the other day. I guess the wee fellow misses you when you're not home.
Entries.summer_Fri8: You're the only person I can talk to about my relationship with Lewis.$3#$e#Thank you for being such a good friend, @.$1
Entries.summer_Sat8: Jas came home with a book about the dwarves.#$e#I hope she doesn't follow in her mother's footsteps.$2#$e#I couldn't bear to lose her too.
Entries.summer_Sun8: Sorry if I'm a bit out of sorts today. Lewis and I had a... well, let's just call it a 'difference of opinion'.$2
Entries.fall_9: I've invited a friend over for dinner.#$e#I really hope he likes my cooking!$2#$b#Who, you ask? I'm afraid that's confidential.$1
Entries.fall_15: The Stardew Valley Fair is tomorrow. I'm looking forward to a bit of friendly competition!#$b#A little tip: aim for variety and quality, show everyone what you've managed to achieve!
Entries.fall_15_2: The Stardew Valley Fair is tomorrow. I'm looking forward to a bit of friendly competition!
Entries.fall_18: Jas made me the cutest card for my birthday!
Entries.fall_18_2: Jas painted me the cutest picture for my birthday!#$b#She's very skilled, that lass.
Entries.fall_26: Jas is insisting that we watch lots of creepy movies in preparation for Spirits' Eve.#$e#I probably won't be able to sleep tonight!
Entries.fall_Mon: The valley always looks beautiful in fall, although it's sad to see the end of summer.
Entries.fall_Tue: I hope you're growing plenty of pumpkins on %farm#$e#My gran made a delicious pumpkin pie. I wish I had inherited her culinary skills!
Entries.fall_Wed: The chickens love scratching in the fallen leaves, but it reminds me winter is on its way.
Entries.fall_Thu: Reaching out to an animal, getting it to trust you...#$e#It really is a wonderful feeling, @.
Entries.fall_Fri: Winter will be here soon and your animals won't want to go outside#$e#Make sure you've got enough hay - and come see me if you need some more, I'm here Wednesday through Sunday!$1
Entries.fall_Sat: Hmmm...? Oh, hello @! Sorry I didn't see you there, I was lost in my book.
Entries.fall_Sun: %farm must look lovely in fall. Keep an eye out for any unusual trees, sometimes strange things pop up around here.
Entries.fall_Mon2: I'm sure you've met my neighbor, Leah. Lovely lass.#$e#She's often roaming around Cindersap, foraging for fruit.
Entries.fall_Wed2: I find it very hard to trust anyone who doesn't like animals.#$e#Is that too judgemental?
Entries.fall_Fri2: $d joja#I'm pretty sure I saw that sleazy Morris-guy sneaking around town last night.#$e#I wonder what he could be up to?|I caught sight of something slinking behind the rubbish bins last night.#$e#Probably a raccoon; they love Evelyn's baking!
Entries.fall_Sat2: Penny is taking the kids to the playground today.#$e#It's such a lovely playground; I wonder if there will ever be more children to play on it.
Entries.fall_Sun2: Shane actually cleaned the kitchen today. That's progress, right?
Entries.fall_Mon4: I must keep an eye out for wild plums, I promised Jas I'd make her favourite pudding.#$e#It's funny: she loves the pudding, but won't eat the fruit.
Entries.fall_Tue4: The goose is causing mischief again. It escaped and chased Vincent up a tree.$2#$e#The kid climbs like a monkey! Still, I shouldn't laugh.$1
Entries.fall_Wed4: Penny is a lovely lass. She's so patient with Vincent and Jas.
Entries.fall_Thu4: Jas is such a quiet child, I worry that she spends so much time by herself.
Entries.fall_Fri4: Vanilla or lavender? What do you think?#$e#Well, I can't go to the saloon smelling like a barnyard!
Entries.fall_Sat4: Sorry, I didn't get much sleep last night.#$e#Oh, let's just say, I had other priorities.$1
Entries.fall_Sun4: Hi @!$h#$e#I'm glad we've become friends. I know I can trust you to take care of my dear animals.
Entries.fall_Mon6: Pumpkin... yams... Oh, I'm trying a new recipe!#$e#It's the Mayor's favourite! I do hope he likes it...$2
Entries.fall_Tue6: Last night's dinner was a disaster. Well, at least the pigs enjoyed it.$2
Entries.fall_Wed6: The death of Jas's mom hit Shane pretty hard.#$e#It's rough to lose someone you love. I wish he would talk to me.
Entries.fall_Thu6: I'm not sure Jas is reading books appropriate for her age.#$e#She asked me what would happen if our animals decided they were in charge.$2#$e#I told her our animals liked us too much to do that. I hope I'm right!$1
Entries.fall_Fri6: Silly isn't it? To feel so nervous? It's only an evening at the saloon.
Entries.fall_Sat6: There's a twig in my hair? Thanks for telling me, @.#$e#Let's just say, last night got a little adventurous...
Entries.fall_Sun6: Do you ever feel like you're fighting a losing battle, @?$2#$b#Shane won't talk to me, not about anything important.$2#$b#It's like he's hiding: in his room, in the saloon... I wish I knew what to do.$2
Entries.fall_Mon8: Do you think Lewis will ever tell me he loves me?#$e#I'm starting to doubt that he does.
Entries.fall_Tue8: Jas has been asking questions about the war against Gotoro.#$e#I don't know what to tell her. Why must people hurt one another, @?
Entries.fall_Thu8: Do you believe in fairies, @? As a child, I left milk out for the house brownie.#$e#She never did my chores though!$1
Entries.fall_Fri8: I enjoy chatting with Lewis, I do! He's great company.#$e#But recently he's started to have certain... expectations...every time we're alone.$2
Entries.fall_Sun8: I tried to have a word last night with Shane, about his drinking...$2#$b#He said some harsh things. Terrible things.$5#$b#I'm worried, @. He's hurting, but I can't help him. I don't know how to reach him.$2
Entries.winter_7: Call me sentimental, but I feel sorry for the poor fish in tomorrow's competition.$2#$e#At least they release them afterwards, I suppose.
Entries.winter_7_2: Call me sentimental, but I feel sorry for the poor fish in tomorrow's competition.$2#$e#At least they release them afterwards, I suppose.
Entries.winter_24_1: Jas is so excited by the secret gift giving tomorrow, she loves deciding what everyone would like.#$e#Last year she gave Sebastian clay. He wasn't impressed.
Entries.winter_24_2: Mayor Lewis first started the secret gift giving to foster community spirit.#$e#Luckily for me, everyone likes eggs!
Entries.winter_Mon: There's something so pure about the forest in winter. Chilly though, isn't it?
Entries.winter_Tue: The rescued hens wandered outside yesterday.#$e#They weren't impressed! I guess they'll learn.
Entries.winter_Wed: How are your animals coping with the cold?#$e#If they're getting grumpy, a radiator might help warm them up.
Entries.winter_Thu: I heard mice scuttling around the barn last night. They come in because of the cold.#$e#I feel sorry for them, but they do make such a mess.
Entries.winter_Fri: It must be so hard for the wild animals in winter, with the ground so cold and little to eat.
Entries.winter_Sat: With no crops to grow, it must be tempting to explore the caves.#$e#Please be careful in there. I've heard the creatures can be hostile.
Entries.winter_Sun: I hope you've got enough hay for winter. Remember, tomorrow I'm not in my shop.#$b#I'd hate for your animals to go hungry!$2
Entries.winter_Mon2: There were strange footprints in the snow near the chicken coops.#$e#I don't think it's a fox.$5
Entries.winter_Tue2: When I was a child, I ate some holly berries. They upset my stomach something horrible.#$e#The animals like them, but even looking at holly makes me ill.
Entries.winter_Wed2: Last night was really chilly. I'm grateful for my goose-down duvet. Humanely made, of course!
Entries.winter_Thu2: Jas is talking about monsters outside at night again.#$e#I *hope* it's just her imagination.
Entries.winter_Fri2: The saloon really cheers me up on these dreary winter nights.#$e#Any particular reason? Well, there might be one...$1
Entries.winter_Sat2: I hope %pet is keeping you warm at night.#$e#You let them sleep on the bed, I hope!
Entries.winter_Sun2: Winter makes me feel lonely. Thanks for stopping by to see me, @.
Entries.winter_Mon4: Jas read me a story she'd written today: about goblins and fairies and a little girl with a cat.#$e#I know I'm biased, but she's very talented.
Entries.winter_Tue4: Caroline and Jodi are always talking about their husbands and children#$e#It makes me feel a little left out, I'm ashamed to say.
Entries.winter_Wed4: The cold weather makes the goose cranky. He stole my egg basket this morning and refused to give it back.
Entries.winter_Thu4: I wonder if Lewis gets lonely in that big empty house of his.#$e#Oh sorry, @! Just thinking aloud.
Entries.winter_Fri4: This fluttering in my stomach: Is it love? Or is it fear?#$e#There's something - well, someone! - making me pensive.
Entries.winter_Sat4: A fox trotted out of the woods this morning, just stood there and stared at me.#$b#The poor thing looked hungry. I hope he doesn't go after my chickens.
Entries.winter_Mon6: Jas drew the creepiest picture today. I'm not sure what to make of it.#$e#I'm hoping it's just her imagination, but I do worry.$2
Entries.winter_Tue6: I thought I heard mice in the coop a few days ago, but now they're gone - and Ebony is looking awfully smug.#$e#Sometimes I wonder about that hen.
Entries.winter_Wed6: Shane and Jas are working on a snowman. It's so great to see him spending time with her.
Entries.winter_Thu6: Have you found a special someone yet, @?#$e#You can talk to me, if you like. I promise I won't gossip!
Entries.winter_Fri6: Am I dating the Mayor? Well, I'm not sure I'd call what we're doing 'dating', exactly...$3
Entries.winter_Sat6: Cosying in front of the fire with a special someone... that sounds like the perfect way to spend a cold winter day.
Entries.winter_Sun6: I thought someone tapped on my bedroom window last night.#$e#But it turned out to be a tree branch.
Entries.winter_Mon8: Jas crawled into my bed last night, sobbing that someone was standing outside her window.#$e#I hope it was just a bad dream.
Entries.winter_Tue8: It's almost the end of another year. I need to make a New Year's resolution.#$e#$q 973/974 NewYearsFollowup#What do you think, @?#$r 973 25 NewYearsLeave#You deserve a partner that respects you.#$r 974 10 NewYearsHobby#You could ask Leah to teach you how to paint.#$r 974 -50 NewYearsNull#You should stay in your shop every day.
Entries.NewYearsLeave: You're right, @. If Lewis really loves me, why does he hide what we have?$3
Entries.NewYearsHobby: That sounds like fun! Maybe Jas could learn too.$1
Entries.NewYearsNull: Oh, come on, @! Allow me my hobbies!#$e#It's not my fault if you're disorganized!$2
Entries.NewYearsFollowup: $p 973#I'm going to give Lewis one last chance. And if he still says 'No'... This sham of a relationship is over, @!$3|Have you got any goals for the year, @?
Entries.winter_Wed8: Thank you for keeping my secret, @.#$e#I'd be so embarrassed if everyone was gossiping about it.
Entries.winter_Thu8: $d cc#Shane's really been a great help on the farm over winter.|Jas helps me collect the eggs. The animals seem very fond of her.
Entries.winter_Fri8: Friday nights have lost a little of their charm. Still, it is nice to catch up with everyone.
Entries.winter_Sat8: #$1 WinterStarThanks#Thank you for being there for me, @. Here, I have a little something for you.[348]$1#$k#I'm so happy to have you as my friend, @.
Entries.winter_Sun8: Winter is the time of year to spend with family and friends.#$e#Animals are family too, of course!
Entries.spring_Mon_inlaw_Shane: Jas loves spending Mondays with Shane. He lets her get away with far more than I do!
Entries.Tue8_inlaw_Shane: Seeing you and Shane together... it's beautiful. You accept him for himself.#$e#Why can't Lewis accept me for myself? Why must he insist we hide?
Entries.Tue10_inlaw_Shane: I hope I find someone, one day, who looks at me the way Shane looks at you.
Entries.winter_Wed_inlaw_Shane: We gave Jas the option, you know, of moving in with Shane and you.#$b#She insisted she stay. Because she was worried I'd get lonely.$2
Entries.winter_Fri6_inlaw_Shane: Farm life agrees with Shane. He's got more color in his cheeks, and a spring in his step.#$b#Thank you, @, for helping him where I could not.$3
Entries.fall_Sun_inlaw_Shane: I hope Shane cooks for you occasionally. Although he never really mastered more than the microwave.$3#$b#The chickens miss his culinary accidents. But I don't miss the clean-up afterwards!
Entries.Saloon_Sat: I always see Clint here but he never talks to anyone. I think he's lonely.$s
